comment.body: Just a tip: you might want to not have the whole article displayed. I think a line break (blank line) will do that.

> [darkstratus](#comment_2_1FieP4c1gxFme5webFJB9x5ZPBXdR6p3Fs): About an hour ago I was wondering how I could do that. :)
> You mean the \<br/\> tag? Where do I put it? I tried putting it at the end of the article but it didin't work.

Markdown treats a single blank line as a line break, so try placing one after the summary.

> [darkstratus](#comment_3_1FieP4c1gxFme5webFJB9x5ZPBXdR6p3Fs): Hey, the --- did the trick. Thank you (@muja and @pycole).

I was wrong, but you're welcome anyway I suppose. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
